name: 李俊豪
objective: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2.雷射基本原理  3.各種雷射介紹  4.雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
schedule:
a1 b1 Introduction to lasers
a2 b2 Energy states and gain
a3 b3 The Fabry-perot etalon
a4 b4 Transverse mode properties
a5 b5 Solid-state lasers
a6 b6 Introduction to nonlinear optics
a7 b7 Basic optics
a8 b8 Laser Safety
a9 期中考
a10 b9 Lasers for Materials Processing
a11 b10 Optics and Optical Systems
a12 b11 Laser-Material Interactions
a13 b12 Laser Cutting/Marking
a14 b13 Hole Drilling
a15 b14 Trimming/Repair
a16 b15 Flat Panel Display
a17 b16 Electronic Packaging
a18 期末考
scorePolicy:
1. 專題討論及報告
2. 實作討論及報告
materials:
1. Laser Engineering (Kelin J. Kuhn)
2. LIA Handbook of Laser Materials Processing (John F. Ready)
3. Laser Electronics (Joseph T. Verdeyen)
4. Optoelectronics An Introduction (J. Wilson)
5. Modern Optical Engineering The Design of Optical Systems (Warren J. Smith)
